summary: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.
cast: Victor Sjöström|Bibi Andersson|Ingrid Thulin|Gunnar Björnstrand|Jullan Kindahl|Folke Sundquist|Björn Bjelfvenstam|Naima Wifstrand|Gunnel Broström|Gertrud Fridh|Sif Ruud|Gunnar Sjöberg|Max von Sydow|Åke Fridell|Yngve Nordwall|Per Sjöstrand|Gio Petré|Gunnel Lindblom|Maud Hansson|Ann-Marie Wiman|Eva Norée|Lena Bergman|Monica Ehrling|Peder Hellman|Ulf Johansson|Göran Lundquist|Josef Norman|Gunnar Olsson|Vendela Rudbäck|Per Skogsberg|Helge Wulff
title: Fresas salvajes
